00029     class BoolOperation : public AsyncOperation {
00030     public:
00031 
00035         BoolOperation(Callback<bool> *c) {
00036             cb = c;
00037         }
00038 
00039     protected:
00043         Callback<bool> *cb;
00044     };

00049     class ResetOperation : public BoolOperation {
00050     public:
00051         ResetOperation(Callback<bool> *c) : BoolOperation(c) {}
00052 
00056         bool execute(KVStore *tut) {
00057             tut->reset();
00058             bool t = true;
00059             cb->callback(t);
00060             return true;
00061         }
00062     };

00067     class NOOPOperation : public BoolOperation {
00068     public:
00069         NOOPOperation(Callback<bool> *c) : BoolOperation(c) {}
00070 
00074         bool execute(KVStore *tut) {
00075             bool rv = true;
00076             cb->callback(rv);
00077             return true;
00078         }
00079     };

00162     class AsyncQueue {
00163     public:
00164 
00168         AsyncQueue() {
00169             pthread_mutex_init(&mutex, NULL);
00170             pthread_cond_init(&cond, NULL);
00171         }
00172 
00176         ~AsyncQueue() {
00177             pthread_cond_destroy(&cond);
00178             pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex);
00179         }
00180 
00186         void addOperation(AsyncOperation *op) {
00187             LockHolder lh(&mutex);
00188             ops.push(op);
00189             if(pthread_cond_signal(&cond) != 0) {
00190                 throw std::runtime_error("Error signaling change.");
00191             }
00192         }
00193 
00203         void drainTo(std::queue<AsyncOperation*> &out) {
00204             LockHolder lh(&mutex);
00205             if(ops.empty()) {
00206                 if(pthread_cond_wait(&cond, &mutex) != 0) {
00207                     throw std::runtime_error("Error waiting for signal.");
00208                 }
00209             }
00210             for(int i = 0; i < MAX_DRAIN && !ops.empty(); i++) {
00211                 out.push(ops.front());
00212                 ops.pop();
00213             }
00214         }
00215 
00216     private:
00217         pthread_mutex_t             mutex;
00218         pthread_cond_t              cond;
00219         std::queue<AsyncOperation*> ops;
00220     };
00221 
00225     class AsyncExecutor {
00226     public:
00227 
00232         AsyncExecutor(KVStore *d, AsyncQueue *q) {
00233             tut     = d;
00234             iq      = q;
00235             running = true;
00236         }
00237 
00241         void run() {
00242             while(running) {
00243                 std::queue<AsyncOperation*> ops;
00244                 iq->drainTo(ops);
00245                 tut->begin();
00246                 int count = 0;
00247 
00248                 while(!ops.empty()) {
00249                     AsyncOperation *op = ops.front();
00250                     ops.pop();
00251 
00252                     op->execute(tut);
00253                     count++;
00254                 }
00255 
00256                 tut->commit();
00257             }
00258         }
00259 
00260     private:
00261         bool            running;
00262         KVStore *tut;
00263         AsyncQueue     *iq;
00264     };
00265 
00266     static void* launch_executor_thread(void* arg) {
00267         AsyncExecutor *executor = (AsyncExecutor*) arg;
00268         try {
00269             executor->run();
00270         } catch(...) {
00271             std::cerr << "Caught a fatal exception in the thread" << std::endl;
00272         }
00273     }
00274 
00278     class QueuedKVStore : public KVStore {
00279     public:
00280 
00284         QueuedKVStore(KVStore *t) {
00285             tut = t;
00286             iq = new AsyncQueue();
00287             executor = new AsyncExecutor(tut, iq);
00288 
00289             if(pthread_create(&thread, NULL, launch_executor_thread, executor)
00290                != 0) {
00291                 throw std::runtime_error("Error initializing queue thread");
00292             }
00293         }
00294 
00298         ~QueuedKVStore() {
00299             delete iq;
00300             delete executor;
00301         }
00302 
00306         void reset() {
00307             std::queue<AsyncOperation*> opq;
00308             RememberingCallback<bool> cb;
00309             iq->addOperation(new ResetOperation(&cb));
00310             cb.waitForValue();
00311         }
00312 
00316         void set(std::string &key, std::string &val,
00317                  Callback<bool> &cb) {
00318             iq->addOperation(new SetOperation(key, val, &cb));
00319         }
00320 
00324         void get(std::string &key, Callback<GetValue> &cb) {
00325             iq->addOperation(new GetOperation(key, &cb));
00326         }
00327 
00331         void del(std::string &key, Callback<bool> &cb) {
00332             iq->addOperation(new DeleteOperation(key, &cb));
00333         }
00334 
00339         void noop(Callback<bool> &cb) {
00340             iq->addOperation(new NOOPOperation(&cb));
00341         }
00342 
00343     private:
00344         KVStore *tut;
00345         AsyncQueue     *iq;
00346         AsyncExecutor  *executor;
00347         pthread_t       thread;
00348     };

00350 }
